FuncDef: The display radius-server item command displays the RADIUS server configuration. The display radius-server item command displays the RADIUS server configuration.
CLIs: display radius-server item { ip-address <ip-address> { accounting | authentication } | template <template-name> }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address of the RADIUS server.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Displays the RADIUS server template name.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
